name: Archery Battle
description:
Archery Battle is a fun-addicting and really challenging aim and shoot game. You will stand on a platform being constantly attacked by enemies. All you have is a bow and an endless amount of arrows. What’s your goal? Kill them all before they get rid of you. See how many attackers you can eliminate in one round. Earn coins for every kill and aim for the heads and the apples to receive even more coins, which you can spend on upgrades for your stickman. Enjoy Archery Battle!

Archery Battle is highly level of bowman game when you must fight arrow games with one or multiple the archers with your bow , let use all skill you have to kill your enemy , The battle will be extremely fierce !

You will be one of the best archers in the world , When alone fighting the dark forces your arrow shooting , Arrow shooting will be the most important skill you must use in this Archery Battle or just simple arrow games you are enjoying!

Enjoy and indulge your archery passion while you were a child! Don’t stop let fight.
To shoot your bow, simply drag your finger across the screen and you'll be presented Release your finger to release the bow.

Keywords :

archer vs archer,
arrow shooting,
bow stickman,
the archers,
bow,
